Vindictus.Lucky Sprint!! Event:
g]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1021/ingame_loadingbanner_1920x663.jpg?width=1283&height=443&mode=max[/img]


 


[b][u]Event Period[/u]
[/b]May 20th, 2025 (After Maintenance) - June 3rd, 2025 (Before Maintenance)


<sub>(* Per Character Event)</sub>


 



 


[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u]


1. Gain the "Lucky Sprint" Boon when playing Raid battles during the event.


2. The Boon tier increases 1 time upon completing a raid, up to 5 stages.


- [u]The "Lucky Sprint" Boon stage resets every day at 9 AM UTC during the event period.[/u]


- Stage increases by 1 for clearing a raid once, regardless of the raid's difficulty(Solo, Normal, Hero+).


- Resenlian's Battle Completion Scrol does not increase the Boon stage when used.


[u]- The "Lucky Sprint" Boon does not apply to Redeemers/Space Time Distortion battles.[/u]


<sub>(* Detailed List of eligible battles are listed at the end of the page)</sub>

[b][u]Exchange Shop Period[/u]

(* Per Character Event)


[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u]
1. Obtain up to 20 Vending Machine Tokens every week
- The weekly limit resets every Tuesday at 7 AM UTC.
- Each character can obtain up to 80 tokens.

2. Use Vending Machine Tokens to select a mission from the list in the Event UI, and complete them to receive various rewards.
- You can select Limited Missions and Normal Missions.

3. Players can use coupons received from missions to exchange for items at the Exchange Shop.
- Earn up to 60 coupons per week per account, with a total of 240 coupons during the event period.

Vindictus.A Prophecy That Cannot Be Followed: Morg:
o! This is the Vindictus team.
The newest raid is called [b]A Prophecy That Cannot Be Followed[/b].

The enemy you'll be facing in this raid, [b]Morgant[/b], is a magical blademaster of the Draugr.
In ancient times, this mysterious but brilliant civilization flourished deep beneath Ben Chenner, a Fomor sect that worshipped the Fomor God.
However, when Elchulus fell into a slumber and Ben Chenner burned down to the Blazing Mountain, they vanished from history.

From the ranks of those Draugr, lost to the shadows of time, emerges Morgant.
Despite his calling as a member of the Silent Knights, he is a secretive and complex character who trusts no one.
Soon, his quest for the truth will lead to a fateful encounter, and a first confrontation, with our heroes.

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1030/morgant1.jpg[/img]
<Morgant striking at his surroundings with his magic sword.>

Morgant employs a flashy blade-based combat style with his [b]magic sword[/b], which has been imbued with incredible power.
When this sword is further enchanted, it temporarily changes form, extending into an [b]Erg Blade[/b] that poses a grave threat to the heroes.
Targets hit by the Erg Blade will be inflicted with an [b]Erg Wound[/b].

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1031/morgant2.jpg[/img]
<Morgant readying an attack through his magic sword's Erg Blade.>

The unique fighting style of a spellsword manifests not only through swordsmanship, but also through sorcerous force.
The [b]sigils[/b] he etches onto the battlefield will react to Erg Wounds and spark powerful explosions, so beware this synergy.

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1032/morgant3.jpg[/img]
<Morgant enchanting an area through the power of his magic sword.>

Additionally, he can defend himself from the heroes' attacks with a [b]magic shield[/b], occasionally unleashing fluctuating attacks.

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1033/morgant4.jpg[/img]
<Morgant defending himself with his magic shield.>

As the battle draws to an end, Morgant channels the power contained in his Erg Blade outward in all directions.
Powerful energy will engulf the entire battle arena, requiring quick responses.

[img]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1034/morgant5.jpg[/img]
<Morgant summons the power contained in his Erg Blade.>

Time marches on, and the hero's party marches towards confrontation. We wish you all the very best!
Please stay tuned for our upcoming update... the Vindictus Season 4 Episode 11 Raid, [b]A Prophecy That Cannot Be Followed[/b
